price: Ni iteka riduturutseho. Mu by’ukuri ni twe twohereza (Intumwa),
arabic: أَمۡرٗا مِّنۡ عِندِنَآۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرۡسِلِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: amran min ʿindinā innā kunnā mur'silīna
